projectGridLines.stationName: PharmSight Research and Analytics Pvt. Ltd.
projectGridLines.title: Pharma Forecasting & Competitive Intelligence
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Pharma Forecasting & Competitive Intelligence

Description: Developing various models utilizing different methodologies and datasets to forecast sales and volume for in-line and pipeline Pharmaceutical products

Skill sets: Understanding of Pharma Industry, drug development process, business acumen, logical reasoning, quantitative aptitude, analytical mindset, strong research skills

Traits expectation: Self learning, Research, Attention to detail

Expected learning: In-depth understanding of commercial operations in Pharma Industry, their business challenges and generating strategic insights

Specific courses required for project execution:
